page.title: 20 The Arts
page.content: {Irish dancing}is a popular interest among the children of Belfast. In West Belfast alone there are nine different schools of dancing, and inter-school competitions are a regular occurrence. Many of the children also compete at a national level. The{City of Belfast School of Music provides a peripetetic teaching service in our schools. String, brass, and woodwind instruments are taught at primary and secondary level. The children have the opportunity to participate in group activities at the School of Music until they are 18 years old. Contributing schools; St.Kevin's Girls' Primary, Belfast. St.Teresa's Girls' Primary, Belfast. St.Rose's Girls' Secondary, Belfast.
